sentence: which capitals are in the states that border texas ?
sentence-with-vars: which capitals are in the states that border state0 ?
sql: select state.capital from border_info , state where ( state.state_name = border_info.state_name ) and ( border_info.border = ' texas ' ) ;
sql-with-vars: select state.capital from border_info , state where ( state.state_name = border_info.state_name ) and ( border_info.border = ' state0 ' ) ;
